text: Answer: (c) and (d) Solution: (a) False. TCP uses a Keepalive Timer feature provides a mechanism to identify dead connections. (b) False. The TCP Persistence Timer to deal with a zero-window-size deadlock situation. (c) True. TCP uses a Time Wait Timer to prevent delayed segments from one connection being misinterpreted as being part of a subsequent connection. (d) True. TCP use a Retransmission Timer for retransmission of lost segments
